Testing
=======

Pytest Suite
------------

* Run all tests::

    pytest

* Run a subset::

    pytest path/to/your/tests.py

Test Report
-----------

* View the latest test report:
  `Test Report <all_tests_report.html>`_

Django Test Runner
------------------

* Standard Django runner remains available::

    python manage.py test

Sanity Checks
-------------

* Validate configuration::

    python manage.py check
